actions.name: BatchGetTraces
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of traces specified by ID. Each trace is a collection of segment documents that originates from a single request. Use GetTraceSummaries to get a list of trace IDs

actions.name: CreateGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a group resource with a name and a filter expression

actions.name: CreateSamplingRule
actions.description: Grants permission to create a rule to control sampling behavior for instrumented applications

actions.name: DeleteGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a group resource

actions.name: DeleteSamplingRule
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a sampling rule

actions.name: GetEncryptionConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current encryption configuration for X-Ray data

actions.name: GetGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve group resource details

actions.name: GetGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all active group details

actions.name: GetInsight
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details of a specific insight

actions.name: GetInsightEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the events of a specific insight

actions.name: GetInsightImpactGraph
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the part of the service graph which is impacted for a specific insight

actions.name: GetInsightSummaries
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the summary of all insights for a group and time range with optional filters

actions.name: GetSamplingRules
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all sampling rules

actions.name: GetSamplingStatisticSummaries
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about recent sampling results for all sampling rules

actions.name: GetSamplingTargets
actions.description: Grants permission to request a sampling quota for rules that the service is using to sample requests

actions.name: GetServiceGraph
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a document that describes services that process incoming requests, and downstream services that they call as a result

actions.name: GetTimeSeriesServiceStatistics
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve an aggregation of service statistics defined by a specific time range bucketed into time intervals

actions.name: GetTraceGraph
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a service graph for one or more specific trace IDs

actions.name: GetTraceSummaries
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve IDs and metadata for traces available for a specified time frame using an optional filter. To get the full traces, pass the trace IDs to BatchGetTraces

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for an X-Ray resource

actions.name: PutEncryptionConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update the encryption configuration for X-Ray data

actions.name: PutTelemetryRecords
actions.description: Grants permission to send AWS X-Ray daemon telemetry to the service

actions.name: PutTraceSegments
actions.description: Grants permission to upload segment documents to AWS X-Ray. The X-Ray SDK generates segment documents and sends them to the X-Ray daemon, which uploads them in batches

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to an X-Ray resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an X-Ray resource

actions.name: UpdateGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to update a group resource

actions.name: UpdateSamplingRule
actions.description: Grants permission to modify a sampling rule's configuration
